trans-unit.source: Breaks the current lease on this container.
trans-unit.target: Breaks the current lease on this container.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time to allow the lease to remain, which will be rounded down to seconds.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time to allow the lease to remain, which will be rounded down to seconds.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the break period is the remainder of the current lease, or zero for infinite leases.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the break period is the remainder of the current lease, or zero for infinite leases.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time before the lease ends, to the second.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time before the lease ends, to the second.

trans-unit.source: Breaks the current lease on this container.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the break period is the remainder of the current lease, or zero for infinite leases.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the container.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the access conditions for the container.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: This object is used to track requests, and to provide additional runtime information about the operation.
trans-unit.target: This object is used to track requests, and to provide additional runtime information about the operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> representing the amount of time before the lease ends, to the second.
